level.text: For Initial Retainer Seed Money Loans, eligible expenses are limited to the fees required to retain the professional services of an organizer, appraiser, lawyer, architect, engineer, and/or general developer/consultant.
For Comprehensive Seed Money Loans, eligible expenses shall include the following:
Fees for an organizer, engineer, appraiser, attorney, architect, and general developer/consultant;
Closing costs recoverable from permanent financing;

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 27 DCR 4606, 4609 (October 17, 1980).
